casebody.data:
ALBERT G. TAYLOR, ET AL., M. APPLEBAUM, ET AL., HENRY CHAPMAN AND L. JOHNSON v. THE UNITED STATES Nos. 128-76, 467-76, 459-77

[223 Ct. Cl. 655]

On November 21, 1980, the court ordered that judgment be entered for the plaintiffs whose names appear on the sheets attached to the order and that damages be made payable to the attorney of record for each plaintiff as well as the individual plaintiff.
